lead_paragraph: Burger King Holdings, the hamburger chain, has been eyeing a sale and been in discussions with potential buyers, The Wall Street Journal reported Wednesday, citing unidentified sources.
snippet: Burger King Holdings, the No. 2 U.S. hamburger chain, has been considering a possible sale and has held talks with potential buyers, a source familiar with the situation said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Burger King Is Said to Consider a Sale

abstract: Burger King Holdings, the No. 2 U.S. hamburger chain, has been considering a possible sale and has held talks with potential buyers, a source familiar with the situation said on Wednesday.
